name: No Friend Zone
description:
Can you make it on your own? Your friends give you an advantage, but might slow you down instead! No Friend Zone is a weird game that forces you to decide whether your friends are more important to you or getting to the end of the level!

Created by Crystallized Games, (Stephen Kim and Adam Collver), along with the help of Liam Gallagher and Gui Santos.

This game was created at the GBC July 2016 Game Jam in 12 hours under the theme of isolation.

EDIT: A new version has been uploaded fixing a lot of the bugs that we weren't able to catch during the Jam!
